item.title: Multichannel Lockin v3.2.0.49
item.description:
Product: Multichannel Lockin v3.2.0.49
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Fri, 12 Dec 2025 17:25:42 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Multichannel Lockin for National Instruments' Dynamic Signal Acquisition hardware (4431, 4461, 4462).
- This version is configured to handle multiple cards for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO.
- The analog outputs can be configured to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with (swept) DC offsets.
- Each of the analog inputs can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

Release Notes: [3.2.0]
#147:
- getResults.vi reverted Results dictionary containing scaler elements
- new API methods getResultsArray.vi and analogous Parse Results Array *.vi handles Results dictionary containing array elements

#### Dependencies
- Please ensure that [Visual C++ Redistributable Packages for Visual Studio 2013](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40784) is installed. The bitness must match the application you're targeting.
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Build Support v1.6.0.20
item.description:

#19 Progress Bar (loaded as a dependency)

item.title: Progress Bar v1.0.0.1
item.description:
Product: Progress Bar v1.0.0.1
Company: Levylab
Release Date: Thu, 11 Dec 2025 10:27:07 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Simple progress bar using JKI SMOs.

Release Notes: [1.0.0]
- This is the first stand-alone build of 'Progress Bar.' It was previously included as part of the 'build-support' package.
item.dc:creator: Levylab

item.title: XY Utilities v1.8.0.11
item.description:
Product: XY Utilities v1.8.0.11
Company: PRIrvin
Release Date: Wed, 26 Nov 2025 16:53:13 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Utilities for working with XY-data type (Cluster of 1D X and Y arrays).

Supported methods:
- <b>Arithmetic</b>: Add, Subtract, Multiply, Divide, Square, Log
- <b>Array</b>: Sort, Reverse, Decimate, Decimate Array, Subset, Swap X and Y, Get X and Y, Append, Restrict X Range, Remove Outliers
- <b>Signal Processing</b>: Derivative, Average, Moving Average, Interpolate, Interpolate Parameter, Resample, FFT Spectrum, FFT Power Spectrum, Symmetrize
- <b>Filters</b>: Zero Phase Low Pass, Savitsky-Golay,
- <b>Conversion</b>: Waveform to XY, XY to Waveform, 2D to XY, XY to 2D

Release Notes: New methods:
- Auto Correlation
- Cross Correlation
- Max and Min
- XY to (x,y) and (x,y) to XY

Other:
- Make better and more efficient use of indexing terminals and in-place element structures
item.dc:creator: PRIrvin

item.title: Multichannel Lockin v3.1.0.48
item.description:
Product: Multichannel Lockin v3.1.0.48
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Tue, 25 Nov 2025 17:37:10 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Multichannel Lockin for National Instruments' Dynamic Signal Acquisition hardware (4431, 4461, 4462).
- This version is configured to handle multiple cards for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO.
- The analog outputs can be configured to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with (swept) DC offsets.
- Each of the analog inputs can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

Release Notes: [3.1.0]
#138 Improve status update during Sweep
#139 Information about hardware is now logged to the database
#141 Update Lockin chart
#142 Output filtering: Low pass filters are now cascade instead of direct form; F.output is calculated automatically based on Nyquist criteria and to minimize processing time; Lockin charts are updated with all new pionts (no longer simple sampling or averaging)
#146 Fix issue in which sweep would not be stopped

#### Dependencies
- Please ensure that [Visual C++ Redistributable Packages for Visual Studio 2013](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40784) is installed. The bitness must match the application you're targeting.
item.dc:creator: LevyLab

item.title: Multichannel Lockin v3.0.2.47
item.description:
Product: Multichannel Lockin v3.0.2.47
Company: LevyLab
Release Date: Tue, 25 Nov 2025 16:45:22 -0500
Packager: Patrick Irvin

Description: Multichannel Lockin for National Instruments' Dynamic Signal Acquisition hardware (4431, 4461, 4462).
- This version is configured to handle multiple cards for simultaneous, synchronized AI/AO.
- The analog outputs can be configured to output sine, square, sawtooth, or triangle functions with (swept) DC offsets.
- Each of the analog inputs can be demodulated at multiple frequencies.

Release Notes: [3.1.0]
#138 Improve status update during Sweep
#139 Information about hardware is now logged to the database
#141 Update Lockin chart
#142 Output filtering: Low pass filters are now cascade instead of direct form; F.output is calculated automatically based on Nyquist criteria and to minimize processing time; Lockin charts are updated with all new pionts (no longer simple sampling or averaging)
#146 Fix issue in which sweep would not be stopped

#### Dependencies
- Please ensure that [Visual C++ Redistributable Packages for Visual Studio 2013](https://www.microsoft.com/en-us/download/details.aspx?id=40784) is installed. The bitness must match the application you're targeting.

- <b>Signal Processing</b>: Derivative, Average, Moving Average, Interpolate, Interpolate Parameter, Resample, FFT Spectrum, FFT Power Spectrum, Symmetrize

- <b>Conversion</b>: Waveform to XY, XY to Waveform, 2D to XY, XY to 2D

Release Notes: - Issue #38: New method: Circular Buffer.vi
- Issue #39: Update Moving Average to use Circular Buffer.vi
- New Method: Get Size.vi
